link_desc:
Zabbix 4.4 ships with official Redis template compatible with zabbix_agent2. There can be such situation when zabbix_agent2 is not available for installation in repositories. This set of files is made to overcome such cases by copying zabbix_agent2 behavior. Default template for zabbix is slightly modified:
1. Added new template macros:
{$REDIS.HOST}
{$REDIS.AUTH}
2. Keys redis.[config, info, ping] have different sets of parameters
